snippet: Al Mourabitoun and Al Qaeda in the Islamic Maghreb have complicated histories but maintain ties to Al Qaeda and nomadic tribesmen.
abstract: News Analysis; counterterrorism experts are re-evaluating threat posed by extremist groups in Africa in wake of assault on Radisson Blu hotel in Mali; are analyzing capabilities of Al Mourabitoun and Al Qaeda in Islamic Maghreb, Islamic extremist groups that claimed responsibility for attack.

byline.contributor: Rukmini Callimachi contributed reporting from Paris.

lead_paragraph: Al Mourabitoun and Al Qaeda in the Islamic Maghreb have complicated histories but maintain ties to Al Qaeda and nomadic tribesmen.

headline.main: Groups Claiming Responsibility in Mali Attack Have History of Resilience
headline.print_headline: In a Fertile Region for Terrorist Groups, Two of the Most Dangerous and Resilient

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: Al Qaeda in the Islamic Maghreb
